thread.title: Sports Illustrated Swimsuit 2016 is closer than you think - Swim Daily
thread.title_full: Sports Illustrated Swimsuit 2016 is closer than you think - Swim Daily - SI.com

author: Kelsey Hendrix
title: Sports Illustrated Swimsuit 2016 is closer than you think - Swim Daily
text:
by Kelsey Hendrix Posted: Wed Oct. 7, 2015 If you thought today was just another Wednesday, think again.
For only the second time EVER, we're bringing you an EXCLUSIVE sneak peek into the making of Sports Illustrated Swimsuit 2016 . That's rightâ€”we're back on location making the magic happen, but this time, we're offering up a little preview a whopping FOUR MONTHS IN ADVANCE.
BEACHES. BOMBSHELLS. And all the babes you love are back, in what is guaranteed to be one of our hottest issues of all time. So go on and indulge in a little SI Swimsuit Sneak Peek and prepare to wait with bated breath for the February launch of SI Swimsuit 2016!
BONUS: See some BTS shots from our editor, MJ Day, as we get ready for #SISwim2016!
